member.name: P:Avalonia.Dialogs.ManagedFileDialogOptions.CustomVolumeInfoProvider
member.summary: Allows to redefine how root volumes are populated in the dialog.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Dialogs.ManagedFileDialogOptions.ContentRootFactory
member.summary: Allows to redefine content root. Can be a custom Window or any ContentControl (Popup hosted).
